means: [橄]触球，（因触球获得的）向球门踢球的权利

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"试图，努力，力图"之意。
means: attempt ：较正式用词，侧重已经开始，且希望完成，但常隐含着不一定有预期的结果。
try ：普通用词，可与attempt换用，但强调努力或尝试，后跟不定式表示努力或争取；后跟动名词表示尝试。
endeavour ：正式用词，指尽最大努力、认真地克服困难去做某事。
strive和endeavour一样，表示付出巨大努力，但strive侧重劳累与紧张，而不强调努力的结果。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"试验"之意。
means: trial ： 指为观察、研究某事物以区别其真伪、优劣或效果等而进行较长时间的试验或试用过程。
experiment ： 多指用科学方法在实验室内进行较系统的操作实验以验证、解释或说明某一理论、定理或某一观点等。
test ： 普通用词，含义广，指用科学方法对某物质进行测试以估价其性质或效能等。
try ： 普通用词，多用于口语或非正式场合，指试一试。

sentence.Network_en: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
sentence.Network_cn: 努力过，失败过，没关系，屡战屡败，屡败屡战，每一次失败都比上一次更好。

sentence.Network_en: I try to remember all the good times I've had here.
sentence.Network_cn: 我试着回忆在这里度过的所有美好时光。

sentence.Network_en: "I think I'll try a hypnotist," I said with sudden resolution.
sentence.Network_cn: “我会找催眠师试试，”我突然坚决地说。

phrase.cizu_name: I (或he等) will try anything once

jx.jx_en_mean: used to indicate willingness to do or experience something new
jx.jx_cn_mean: ［用于表示愿意做新事情或体验新东西］我（或他等）随便什么都想试一试
尝试，试验（以确定是否合适）

lj.lj_ly: he was trying the role for size.
lj.lj_ls: 他正在考虑这个角色是否合适。

jx.jx_en_mean: (S. African historical)(under the apartheid system) attempt to pass oneself off as a white (or black) person by assimilating oneself into a white (or black) community
jx.jx_cn_mean: (南非，史)（种族隔离时期）试图以使自己与白人（或黑人）社会同化来达到使自己被当作白人（或黑人）的目的

jx.jx_en_mean: attempt to do (something) for the first time, typically in order to find out if one is good at it
jx.jx_cn_mean: 尝试做（从未做过的事），试身手

lj.lj_ly: a chance to try your hand at the ancient art of drystone walling.
lj.lj_ls: 一次让你尝试古代干砌墙艺术的机会。

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit. informal)attempt to deceive or seduce someone
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英，非正式)试图欺骗，勾引某人

lj.lj_ly: he was &B{trying it on with} my wife.
he was &B{trying it on with} my wife.

jx.jx_en_mean: used to suggest that one may be willing to do something unexpected or unlikely
jx.jx_cn_mean: ［用于表示自己可能会做出使人意想不到或不大可能的事情来］你来试试看吧

lj.lj_ly: ‘You won't use a gun up here.’ ‘Try me.’.
lj.lj_ls: “我不准你在这个地方开枪。”“那你来试一试吧。”。

jx.jx_en_mean: put on an item of clothing to see if it fits or suits one
jx.jx_cn_mean: 试穿（衣、裙、裤、鞋等），试戴（帽、手套）

jx.jx_en_mean: test someone or something new or different to assess their suitability or effectiveness
jx.jx_cn_mean: 考验某人；试验某物，试用某物

lj.lj_ly: I try out new recipes on my daughter.
lj.lj_ls: 我按照新烹饪法做了些菜让女儿来品评。

jx.jx_en_mean: To don (a garment) to test its fit.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 试穿（衣服）：穿上（衣服）以检验其是否合身

jx.jx_en_mean: To undergo a competitive qualifying test, as for a job or athletic team.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 参加选拔：为了工作或运动员资格而参加竞争性资格测试

jx.jx_en_mean: To attempt to do something for the first time

lj.lj_ly: I tried my hand at skiing.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French trier 'sift', of unknown origin. Sense 1 of the noun dates from the early 17th cent

encyclopedia.content: 青春女子三人组合组成的乐队，2006年成立，乐队主要成员是：林可昕、王奕心、沈丹丹三人。2006年12月27日，TRY首张音乐大碟《勇敢的女孩》全亚洲发行，主打歌《不要在我寂寞的时候说爱我》获得中国移动百度手机彩铃排行榜热门金曲第一位

entry.def: If you try to do something, you want to do it, and you take action which you hope will help you to do it.

example.ex: He secretly tried to block her advancement in the Party...
example.tran: 他暗地里设法阻挠她在党内的晋升。

example.ex: Try to make the effort to work your way through all of your tasks one at a time…
example.tran: 争取努力把你所有的任务一次完成一项。

entry.def: To try and do something means to try to do it.

example.ex: He has started a privatisation programme to try and win support from the business community…
example.tran: 他启动了一套私有化方案，以设法赢得商界的支持。

example.ex: I must try and see him.

entry.def: If you try for something, you make an effort to get it or achieve it.

example.ex: My partner and I have been trying for a baby for two years...
example.tran: 我和爱人两年来一直想要个孩子。

example.ex: He said he was going to try for first place next year.
example.tran: 他说他明年会争取夺得第一名。

entry.def: If you try something new or different, you use it, do it, or experience it in order to discover its qualities or effects.

example.ex: It's best not to try a new recipe for the first time on such an important occasion...
example.tran: 在这么重要的场合最好不要尝试以前从未做过的新菜谱。

example.ex: I've tried everything from herbal cigarettes to chewing gum…
example.tran: 中草药香烟、口香糖之类的我统统都试过了。

entry.tran: 到(某处)试试;找(某人)试试
entry.def: If you try a particular place or person, you go to that place or person because you think that they may be able to provide you with what you want.

example.ex: Have you tried the local music shops?
example.tran: 你到当地的音像店找过了吗？

entry.def: If you try a door or window, you try to open it.

example.ex: Bob tried the door. To his surprise it opened.
example.tran: 鲍勃试着推了推门。令他吃惊的是，门竟然开了。

entry.def: When a person is tried, he or she has to appear in a law court and is found innocent or guilty after the judge and jury have heard the evidence. When a legal case is tried, it is considered in a court of law.

example.ex: He suggested that those responsible should be tried for crimes against humanity...
example.tran: 他建议那些责任人应该以反人类罪受到审判。

example.ex: Whether he is innocent or guilty is a decision that will be made when the case is tried in court...
example.tran: 他有罪与否，等案件在法庭受审后就会作出判决。

entry.tran: (橄榄球的)达阵得分(在对方球门线内带球触地得分)
entry.def: In the game of rugby, a try is the action of scoring by putting the ball down behind the goal line of the opposing team.

example.ex: The French, who led 21-3 at half time, scored eight tries.
example.tran: 上半场以 21:3 领先的法国队有 8 个达阵得分。

entry.tran: 没努力尝试;没竭尽全力
entry.def: If you say that something fails but not for want of trying or not for lack of trying, you mean that everything possible was done to make it succeed.

example.ex: Not all is perfect, but it isn't for want of trying.
example.tran: 一切并非无可挑剔，但已经竭尽全力了。

means.word_mean: 1. earnest and conscientious activity intended to do or accomplish something;

sentences.sentence: "made an effort to cover all the reading material"
"wished him luck in his endeavor"
"she gave it a good try"
"He tried to shake off his fears"
"The infant had essayed a few wobbly steps"
"The police attempted to stop the thief"
"He sought to improve himself"
"She always seeks to do good in the world"

means.word_mean: 2. put to the test, as for its quality, or give experimental use to;

sentences.sentence: "This approach has been tried with good results"
"Test this recipe"

means.word_mean: 3. put on trial or hear a case and sit as the judge at the trial of;

sentences.sentence: "The football star was tried for the murder of his wife"
"The judge tried both father and son in separate trials"
"Try these new crackers"
"Sample the regional dishes"

means.word_mean: 5. examine or hear (evidence or a case) by judicial process;

sentences.sentence: "The jury had heard all the evidence"
"The case will be tried in California"
"I've been sorely tried by these students"
"You are trying my patience!"

means.word_mean: 8. melt (fat, lard, etc.) in order to separate out impurities;

sentences.sentence: "try the yak butter"
"render fat in a casserole"

means.word_mean: 9. put on a garment in order to see whether it fits and looks nice;

sentences.sentence: "Try on this sweater to see how it looks"

auth_sentence.content: You can't legislate for the try they scored.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can't legislate for the try they scored.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can't legislate for the try they scored.

auth_sentence.content: England needed a converted try to save the game.
auth_sentence.res_content: England needed a converted try to save the game.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: England needed a converted try to save the game.

auth_sentence.content: Try before you install, No danger of damage .
auth_sentence.res_content: Try before you install, No danger of damage .
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Try before you install, No danger of damage .

sentences.en: If you can't do it the first time, try again.
sentences.cn: 要是你第一次做不成, 就再试一下。

sentences.en: He tried climbing the tall tree.
He has been trying to solve the problem.
sentences.cn: 他一直在设法解决这一问题。

sentences.en: Let me try retelling the story.
sentences.cn: 让我试着复述这个故事吧。
试试看你能有什么办法。

sentences.en: Try how far you can throw.

sentences.cn: 咱们试试哪种办法费时间最多。

sentences.en: Let's try whether it will break.
sentences.cn: 咱们来试试, 看它会不会折断。

sentences.en: She tried herself to describe what she remembered.
sentences.cn: 她尽量说出她记得的情况。
这对你的勇气将是一个考验。

sentences.en: So they tried him and sentenced him to twenty-five years in prison.
sentences.cn: 于是他们对他进行了审讯, 判处了他25年徒刑。

sentences.en: He was tried and found guilty.
He cast off fear and decided to make a try.
sentences.cn: 他去掉害怕心理, 决定试一试。

sentences.en: He had a try at solving the problem.

jushi.english: Don't worry,I'll try and teach you.
Try and see whether you can get it fixed.
jushi.chinese: 你试试看,能否请人把它修好。
